testcase.name: We should be able connect to the database and get the data
testcase.system-out: When connection is established using "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/revaturejwadb" "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver" "root" and "root".passed And I run a select query to get the "product_Name" using "product_Id" to get the data from "products" where 3.passed Then I should see the result as "Monitor"...................................passed

testcase.name: We should be able connect to the database and get the data 2
testcase.system-out: When connection is established using "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/maybankdb" "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver" "root" and "root".passed And I run a select query to get the "Ename" using "EmpId" to get the data from "employee" where 11.passed Then I should see the result as "Mohan".....................................passed

testcase.name: We should be able connect to the database and get the data 3
testcase.system-out: When connection is established using "jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/postgres" "org.postgresql.Driver" "postgres" and "root".passed And I run a select query to get the "first_name" using "id" to get the data from "student" where 1.passed Then I should see the result as "Ahmed".....................................passed
